```{r, include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(pwr)
library(knitr)
library(plotly)
library(extrafont)
library(ggrepel)
library(kableExtra)
library(effsize)
```

```{r, include = FALSE}
lob_size_abun <- read_csv("lobster_size_abundance.csv")
lob_trap <- read_csv("lobster_traps.csv")
```

```{r}
#Producing mean abundance by year

abun_year <- lob_size_abun %>%
  group_by(YEAR) %>% 
  filter(COUNT != "0") %>% 
  summarize(
    mean_abun = round(mean(COUNT), digits = 2)
  )
abun_year

#Producing mean trap count by year

trap_year <- lob_trap %>% 
  group_by(YEAR) %>% 
  summarize(
    mean_trap = round(mean(TRAPS), digits = 2)
  )
trap_year
```
